name: unsubsidized
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not paid for partly by the government or another organization: Students can get unsubsidized loans, which are not based on need. Unsubsidised theatres won't take a risk on an unproven project when a guaranteed blockbuster will pay the bills. Related word
subsidizeCompare
subsidizedSynonym
non-subsidized
More examplesFewer examplesIf a parent cannot earn more than the cost of unsubsidised childcare, they may prefer to carry out the childcare themselves.These practices reduce the world price of grain and make it harder for unsubsidized farmers in poor countries to compete.Healthy, unsubsidized foods like spinach cost five times more to produce, thus driving up the price.

Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to a cost, price, etc. that is paid by the customer and not partly paid by another person, an organization, or the government: Officials said the average graduate debt had risen to $17,000 in subsidized and unsubsidized loans.
